articles.author: Jennifer A Dlouhy
articles.title: Trump Vows ‘Substantial’ India Tariff Hike Over Russian Oil Buying - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: President Donald Trump said he would be “substantially raising” the tariff on Indian exports to the US over the Asian nation’s purchases of Russian oil, a move New Delhi slammed as unjustified in an escalating fight between the two major economies.
